rooms.welcome-message: Hey there! Ever wondered why our world might not be what it seems? It's pretty wild to consider.
rooms.explanation_text:
Meet Flat Earth Believer:
Your Companion in exploring the Flat Earth Theory! Embark on a journey of discovery and curiosity with Flat Earth Bot! Uncover thought-provoking discussions, intriguing arguments, and evidence that challenge the mainstream view of a spherical Earth.
